scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-server
scripts.dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development pm2 start ./build/server.js
scripts.staging: npm run build && NODE_ENV=staging pm2 --log /app/library-log/pm2.log start ./build/server.js
scripts.production: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 --log /app/library-log/pm2.log start ./build/server.js
scripts.stop: pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all
